QuestData.Title: Step into the Dark
QuestData.Description:
With the threat to my people quelled, I believe it is time to introduce you to my kin.
Meet me at Stonedark Grotto, and you will see where we live.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Navarrogg at Stonedark Grotto.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to our humble home. You are free to move about here from now on.
